location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 55: William Hornby, Daniel Draper, Nathaniel Stackhouse, William Ashburner, Andrew Ramsay, Thomas Day and John Torlesse, Council at Bombay Castle, to Edward Galley, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: This letter confirms the receipt of letters dated 31 December 1780 and 2 and 9 January 1781. It informs Edward Galley, Resident at Bushire, that a dispatch of twenty-eight bales of broad cloth and twenty bales of long ells has been sent by the Mercury.
